element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm calculates the existing angle between the vertical and the vector normal to surface at each point.

element.name: METHOD
element.text: The method to use may be selected from the following ones: * Maximum slope (Travis et al. 1975). * Maximum Triangle Slopes (Tarboton 1997). * Plane fitting (Costa-Cabral & Burges 1996). * Degree Polynom (Bauer, Rohdenburg, Bork 1985). * Degree Polynom (Heerdegen & Beran 1982). * Degree Polynom (Zevenbergen & Thorne 1987). * Degree Polynom (Haralick 1983).

element.name: UNITS
element.text:
Slope might be expresses in radians, degrees or percentage.
Notice that most SEXTANTE algorithms that take a slope layer as input, need a layer with slope expressed in radians.
